meanings.sent1: The doctor diagnosed the patient with erysipelas.
meanings.sent2: Erysipelas can spread easily if not treated promptly.
meanings.sent3: The clown joked that his red nose looked like erysipelas.
meanings.sent4: Her anger was like a spreading erysipelas, infecting everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: The vivid redness of erysipelas on his arm was a stark contrast to his pale skin.

meanings.definition: An acute febrile disease characterized by inflammation and redness of the skin.
meanings.sent1: The outbreak of erysipelas in the village caused panic among the residents.
meanings.sent2: The symptoms of erysipelas include fever and skin discoloration.
meanings.sent3: The party was so hot and lively, it felt like a case of erysipelas spreading through the crowd.
